plot: At a lakeside hotel, Michel Piccoli discusses the centennial of cinema with Jean-Luc Godard. Godard asks why should cinema's birthday be celebrated when the history of film is a forgotten ...
title: 100 ans de cinéma: Deux fois 50 ans de cinéma français
